content.raw:
This modification needs of the proper pbuilder hook to run rosdep init as root before the building (A-scripts). See [this commit](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/commits/2d74618428d8bc61997b173037cbbd06) for reviewing the code.

Also, in this pull request, I've changed the detection of groovy setup.sh and made it mandatory so if it is not present, it will fail quickly and do not start the compilation and fail there.
content.html:
This modification needs of the proper pbuilder hook to run rosdep init as root before the building (A-scripts). See this commit for reviewing the code.

Also, in this pull request, I've changed the detection of groovy setup.sh and made it mandatory so if it is not present, it will fail quickly and do not start the compilation and fail there.
